sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SMALAND, or East Gothland, a province of Sweden, which makes part of Gothland ; and is bounded on the north by Oſtrogothia or Eaſt Gothland, on the eaſt by the Baltic Sea, on the ſouth by Schonen and Bleckingia, and on the west by Weſtrogothia or Weft Gothland. It is about 112 miles in length, and 62 in breadth. Calmar is the capital town.
